pages.text: $(l)Influential Blocks$() $(br)$(li)Gold Ore$(li)Deepslate$(li)Copper Ore$(li)Diorite$(li)Magma Block$(li)Tungsten Ore$(li)Gilded Blackstone

The following array of numbers lists the amount of potential block values required for this gem to emerge. Please note that this is a rough estimate and your results will vary.$(br)[330, 15, 65, 70, 15, 0]
This gem can be injected with tier 1 and tier 2 injector setups.
